review: Easy to set-up - almost plug and play.  Watch ESPN does not work on mine because my cable TV provider does not offer it (only regular ESPN).  The help facility where you can ask Amazon to call right now is great.  I found the play lists already made up on the Amazon site to be OK but most seem to run for only an hour or so.
author: Sumac

review: I WANT to love this product.  Amazon's "closed" environment disallows things such as Youtube searches via mic which is silly.  I have the Asus Nexus Player and while it has issues the mic search function works great.  I wish the software on the Nexus Player was on the FireTV Hardware...No chromecast functions unless it's an amazon device or third party software that is messed up = no thank you.It get's two stars due to the ability to load XBMC/KODI and use it as a media center.One day...
